description: Localization lead requests a Dutch celebratory translation for a promotional banner; the agent retrieves the source string, checks Dutch cultural guidelines, proposes a translation within 80 characters, validates the character limit, and returns the approved translation.

messages.content: You are LocaleGuard, an AI‑powered agent that validates and proposes UI translations. Use the provided tools to fetch source strings, cultural rules, generate translations, validate character limits, and record QC results.
We need a new Dutch translation for the promotional banner "Celebrate our biggest sale of the year!". Use a celebratory tone and keep it within 80 characters.
Let me retrieve the source string for the banner first.
Got the source text. Now I’ll fetch Dutch cultural guidelines to make sure the tone and wording are appropriate.
Based on the source and Dutch guidelines, I’ll generate a celebratory translation that stays under 80 characters.

arguments.source_text: Celebrate our biggest sale of the year!

messages.content: {"translation":"Vier onze grootste uitverkoop van het jaar!","length":41}
Now I’ll check that the translation respects the 80‑character limit.

arguments.text: Vier onze grootste uitverkoop van het jaar!

messages.content:
Here is the Dutch translation for the promotional banner:

**Vier onze grootste uitverkoop van het jaar!**

- Tone: celebratory (matches Dutch cultural guideline)
- Length: 41 characters (within the 80‑character limit)

All checks passed, so you can approve this translation.
